scenario.title: A workflo4people backend login attempt with invalid credentials
scenario.step: Given The workflow4people backend is started
When I enter invalid backend credentials
And I log in to the backend
Then I should not be logged in to the backend

scenario.title: A workflo4people backend login attempt with valid credentials
scenario.step: Given The workflow4people backend is started
When I enter valid backend credentials
And I log in to the backend
Then I should be logged in to the backend
